text: Second Presbyterian Church of Memphis, Tennessee is a historic congregation, in the Evangelical Presbyterian Church, located at 4055 Poplar Avenue. Its former 1891 building is listed on the National Register of Historic Places but was sold by the congregation in 1952 when it moved to its current location. The present building was designed by Walter H. Thomas and Harold E. Wagoner, and received the Second Award for Large Churches from the Church Architectural Guild of America . ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Churches in Memphis, Tennessee Category:Presbyterian churches in Tennessee Category:Evangelical Presbyterian churches Category:Presbyterian megachurches in the United States Category:Churches completed in 1952
title: Second Presbyterian Church (Memphis, Tennessee) (1952)
